full_summary:
================================

**Title**
---------
Second Language Training for Foreign Service Officers

**Reference**
------------

* Reference Number: cb-578-68288599
* Solicitation Number: CIC-156707-A
* Amendment Number: 5

**Tender Details**
-----------------

* Tender Closing Date: July 9, 2024, at 02:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 4, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025
* Tender Status: Expired

**Notice Type**
----------------

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal

**Procurement Method**
-----------------------

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria**
----------------------

* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements**
---------------------

The contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity**
---------------------------

* Region: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Regions of Delivery**
-------------------------

* Region: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Canada

**Contracting Entity**
----------------------

* Contracting Entity: Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada
* Address: 70 CREMAZIE, GATINEAU, Quebec J8L2Z5, Canada

**Contact Information**
------------------------

* Name: Jean-Philippe Tambeau
* Email: jean-philippe.tambeau@cic.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 574-4419

**Tender Description**
------------------------

Immigration, Refugee's and Citizenship Canada's (IRCC) International Network has a requirement for in-person Second Language Training. The training will be given to Foreign Service Officers (FSO) on an "as and when requested" basis. The program will be structured to provide FSOs with the training to achieve a C
